long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
Twitter Export Followers-Following allows you to quickly extract and export your followers, verified followers and following from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

ğŸ† Advantage
The Twitter Export Followers-Following extension's most significant advantage over others is its ability to intelligently adjust the time intervals between extractions to avoid the common issue of encountering 'Too Many Requests' errors due to Twitter's rate limits, which can lead to minimal data extraction.

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Features
âœ“ Extract and export Followers from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract and export Verified Followers from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract and export Following from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract user profile, including user_id, name, user_name, bio, created_at, can_dm, tweets_count, followers_count, following_count, favourites_count, media_count, location, profile_url, avatar_url, profile_banner_url, verified, is_blue_verified.

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter userâ€™s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Followers, Verified Followers or Following.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

ğŸ“¬ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

ğŸ“ƒ Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

â„¹ï¸ Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,zh_CN:
Twitter Export Followers-Following allows you to quickly extract and export your followers, verified followers and following from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

ğŸ† Advantage
Our extension can export more data, as we comply with Twitter's rate limits.

ğŸŸ¢ indicates the normal time interval for requests
ğŸŸ  indicates the cooldown period's time interval
ğŸ”´ indicates the time interval for request errors

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Features
âœ“ Extract and export Followers from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract and export Verified Followers from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract and export Following from Twitter to CSV
âœ“ Extract user profile, including user_id, name, user_name, bio, created_at, can_dm, tweets_count, followers_count, following_count, favourites_count, media_count, location, profile_url, avatar_url, profile_banner_url, verified, is_blue_verified.

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter userâ€™s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Select Export Type: Followers, Verified Followers or Following.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

âš ï¸ Caution
To avoid being flagged by Twitter's risk control for frequent data exports, we suggest creating a dedicated Twitter account for exporting data.

ğŸ“¬ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

ğŸ“ƒ Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

â„¹ï¸ Statement
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. Twitter Export Followers-Following is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
